eegdash.dataset.DS004330
========================

The spatiotemporal neural dynamics of object recognition for natural images and line drawings (MEG) (OpenNeuro ``ds004330``). Access recordings and metadata through EEGDash.

.. rst-class:: sd-badges

:bdg-light:`Modality: meg` :bdg-light:`Tasks: 1` :bdg-light:`License: CC0` :bdg-light:`Subjects: 30` :bdg-light:`Recordings: 270` :bdg-light:`Source: openneuro`

Quickstart
----------

**Install**

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install eegdash

**Load a recording**

.. code-block:: python

   from eegdash.dataset import DS004330

   dataset = DS004330(cache_dir="./data")
   recording = dataset[0]
   raw = recording.load()

**Filter/query**

.. tab-set::

   .. tab-item:: Basic

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS004330(cache_dir="./data", subject="01")

   .. tab-item:: Advanced

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS004330(
             cache_dir="./data",
             query={"subject": {"$in": ["01", "02"]}},
         )
